[`func next() async throws(Self.Failure) -> Self.Element?`](/documentation/swift/asyncprefixwhilesequence/iterator/next()-72tqd)Default implementation of `next()` in terms of `next(isolation:)`, which is required to maintain backward compatibility with existing async iterators.[`func next(isolation: isolated (any Actor)?) async throws(Self.Failure) -> Self.Element?`](/documentation/swift/asyncprefixwhilesequence/iterator/next(isolation:)-4dc20)Default implementation of `next(isolation:)` in terms of `next()`, which is required to maintain backward compatibility with existing async iterators.
